long_description: Most sunglasses don't float and you don't want to find out the hard way! Add Croakies floating buoy attachments to your Croakies ARC System sunglass retainers (sold separately) for security. The Croakies ARC Float Kit is customizable: add 1, 2, 3 or all 4 foam buoys-depending on weight of your glasses. Kit includes 4 individual floating foam buoys.
